com.scandilabs.catamaran.util
Class ThreadLocalUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.scandilabs.catamaran.util.ThreadLocalUtils

public class ThreadLocalUtils
extends Object

A local utility class to retrieve ThreadLocal variables. e.g.: Every Controllers are responsible to set the HttpSession on the ThreadLocal instance This class may go off if the session object is passed at a 2-3 level depth of method chain invocation
